name: postgres-mcp-server
description: A Model Context Protocol server for PostgreSQL databases

scripts.build:bin: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --minify index.ts --outfile dist/postgres-mcp-server-darwin-arm64 && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-darwin-x64 index.ts --outfile dist/postgres-mcp-server-darwin-x64 && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 index.ts --outfile dist/postgres-mcp-server-linux-x64 && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-linux-arm64 index.ts --outfile dist/postgres-mcp-server-linux-arm64 && bun build --compile --minify --target=bun-windows-x64 index.ts --outfile dist/postgres-mcp-server-windows-x64.exe
